info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.marketplace.aws_account
info.description: APIs to manage AWS Account resources.

post.description: Use this API to register F5XC AWS marketplace product for F5XC service.

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

post.description: Use this API to signup AWS account for F5XC service.

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

aws_accountRegistrationRequest.description: Request to register F5XC AWS marketplace product for F5XC service.
aws_accountRegistrationRequest.title: RegistrationRequest

x_amzn_marketplace_token.description:
AWS customerâ€™s registration token

Example: ` "x-amzn-marketplace-token=<token val>"`
x_amzn_marketplace_token.title: x-amzn-marketplace-token

aws_accountRegistrationResponse.description: Response to register F5XC AWS marketplace product
aws_accountRegistrationResponse.title: RegistrationResponse

redirect_url.description:
Registration redirect URL for redirecting the AWS customer to login/registration page

Example: ` "redirect_urlhttps://console.ves.volterra.io/login/start"`
redirect_url.title: redirect_url

domain.description:
domain of the account

Example: ` "john-deer"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 17
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.not_in: [\"ves\",\"volterra\"]
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.ves_object_name: true
domain.title: Domain

locale.description:
locale of the account

Example: ` "en-US"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 16
locale.title: Locale

tos_accepted_at.description:
terms of services accepted timestamp

Example: ` "2020-04-20T12:32:51.341959216Z"`
tos_accepted_at.title: TOS Accepted Timestamp

tos_version.description:
terms of services version

Example: ` "v2022.3.14"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 12
tos_version.title: TOS Version

name.description:
name of the company

Example: ` "F5 Networks, Inc"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 256
name.title: Name

signupContactMeta.description:
Instance of one single contact that can be used to communicate with customers.
Depending on contact type we use these details to send general communication (regular, physical mail) or invoices.
signupContactMeta.title: ContactMeta

city.description:
city / town of the contact

Example: ` "Sunnyvale"`
city.title: city

country.description:
country of contact (e.g. USA). refer to https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1, column alpha-2

Example: ` "US"`
country.title: country

county.description:
county (optional, for countries where they have counties)

Example: ` "Santa Clara"`
county.title: county

phone_number.description:
phone number of the contact

Example: ` "+11234567890"`
phone_number.title: phone_number

state.description:
state (optional, for countries where they have states)

Example: ` "California"`
state.title: state

state_code.description:
state code (optional, for countries where they have states)

Example: ` "CA"`
state_code.title: state code

contact_number.description:
contact number of the user

Example: ` "+14084004001"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 256
contact_number.title: Contact Number

email.description:
email of the user

Example: ` "jane.doe@gmail.com"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 256
email.title: E-mail

first_name.description:
first name of the user

Example: ` "Jane"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 256
first_name.title: First Name

last_name.description:
last name of the user

Example: ` "Doe"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 256
last_name.title: Last Name
